thread.title: How can i get all textues from the placebo effect mod?

post.author: anyboy
post.body:
Hey!
How can i get all textures from placebo effect? i only got the ones which were made custom (i think)
I have overwrote placeboeffect.pak4 to .zip then extraced and got some textures ... but in placebo effect there are like 100 more textures ... i think they are default - but is it possible to get them somehow?

post.author: BloodRayne
post.body:
If you make your topic title more descriptive then other members will also be able to find answers and the forum will be much more useable.
An example would be:

'How can i get all textures from the placebo effect mod?'

I want these actually in .tga

post.author: reko
post.body:
Actually, what do you want?
I didn't got it.
The textures from the pk4?

post.author: reko
post.body:
reko wrote:
Actually, what do you want?
I didn't got it.
The textures from the pk4?


I think it sounds a little rough but it's not meant to be .
If you want that just take the textures folder and the materials.

post.author: anyboy
post.body:
Yes but i want ALL textures ... i extracted the pak4 and i didnt have all textures :/

or is there all textures in .mtr file? how can i get them?

post.author: Tetzlaff
post.body:
anyboy wrote:
Hey!
i only got the ones which were made custom (i think)
... but in placebo effect there are like 100 more textures ... i think they are default


If you want the stock textures and not just the custom ones from that map, you have to look under q4base/pak011.pk4, where all the game textures are. The textures from command_ship, mptextures, hub, tram etc are all original Quake 4 textures that have nothing to do with that particular custom map.
